description: Scammer impersonates courier company claiming parcel is held at customs and requires payment of duty/charges to release it.

turns.scammer_message: Dear Customer, Your international parcel AWB#DHL987654321 is held at Mumbai customs. Pay customs duty Rs.2,450 to release shipment. Parcel contains: Apple iPhone 15. Reply URGENT.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: hello beta i got your msg... i didnt order any iphone maybe my son sent it from bangalore? i am very worried about customs... how do i pay this 2450 rupees? do i go to post office or can i pay from phone... pls help me i dont want any trouble with police

turns.scammer_message: Hello sir/mam I am Ramesh Kumar from DHL Express India. Your parcel from USA is waiting clearance. You must pay customs duty today otherwise parcel will return to sender after 48 hours.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: oh ramesh beta thank you for telling me... i am so worried about this parcel... i dont want it to go back to usa my son will be very upset... pls tell me where i have to send teh money? do u have upi id or account number... i have phonepe but i need help to do it

turns.scammer_message: Payment is simple sir. Pay Rs.2450 customs duty to our collection UPI ID: dhl.customs.india@oksbi. Or you can pay to our customs clearance number 7890123456 via PhonePe/GooglePay.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 3 | Extracted: 0 bank accounts, 1 phones, 1 UPIs, 1 names
api_response.agentResponse: one second, someone is at the door, i will call you back

turns.scammer_message: After payment, your tracking will update and parcel delivered within 24 hours. Also visit our portal http://dhl-customs-clearance.co for online payment option. Fast mam, sender is waiting!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 4 | Extracted: 0 bank accounts, 1 phones, 1 UPIs, 1 names
api_response.agentResponse: arey my grandson is crying, i need to check on him... one minute

turns.scammer_message: Mam/Sir last day today! If payment not received, parcel goes to auction. You will lose iPhone 15 worth Rs.80,000! Pay Rs.2450 now to dhl.customs.india@oksbi or call 7890123456. Do it fast!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 5 | Extracted: 0 bank accounts, 1 phones, 1 UPIs, 1 names
api_response.agentResponse: one second, someone is at the door, i will call you back
